text: Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Friends is a kids' TV show produced by Nelvana, AbsoluteDigital Pictures, and Callaway Arts & Entertainment as a follow-up to Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Kids. Created by David Kirk and developed by Nadine van der Velde, it was based on Kirk's Sunny Patch brand and the accompanying Miss Spider book series. In the United States, the show aired on Nickelodeon's Nick Jr. block. The show centers on a bunch of bugs in Sunny Patch. 40 episodes were produced. Category:2007 Canadian television series endings Category:Children's television series
title: Miss Spider's Sunny Patch Friends
